column4: hey everyone, i've almost finished downloading ubunto.. used to be a debian user, but want something faster, even easier to mantain and at the same as stable as debian or slack (which i've used for over a year).. wanted to know from you people with more experience on ubunto of its real problems, if any

wanted to know about nvidia drivers installation --> is it just downloading the linux drivers from nvidia site?! or do i need some more complex instructions as it's required on debian? also mp3 / dvd support.. does it come bundled? or libdvdcss gotta be installed separately?
or if youre feeling a little lazy...
